= Source repository =
You can check out the latest unstable source code of IBus using git. Or browse source code via [http://github.com/ibus/ web interface] .

== IBus Core ==
{{{
 $ git clone git://github.com/ibus/ibus.git ibus
}}}

== IBus Qt4 ==
{{{
 $ git clone git://github.com/ibus/ibus-qt.git ibus-qt
}}}

== Chinese !PinYin engine ==
{{{
 $ git clone git://github.com/ibus/ibus-pinyin.git ibus-pinyin
}}}

== General Table engine ==
{{{
 $ git clone git://github.com/kaio/ibus-table.git ibus-table
}}}
== Chinese Chewing engine ==
{{{
 $ git clone git://github.com/definite/ibus-chewing.git ibus-chewing
}}}

== Japanese Anthy engine ==
{{{
 $ git clone git://github.com/ibus/ibus-anthy.git ibus-anthy
}}}

== Korean Hangul engine ==
{{{
 $ git clone git://github.com/choehwanjin/ibus-hangul.git ibus-hangul
}}}

== M17N engine == 
{{{
 $ git clone git://github.com/ibus/ibus-m17n.git ibus-m17n
}}}

== Template engine == 
{{{
 $ git clone  git://github.com/ibus/ibus-tmpl.git ibus-tmpl
}}}
